Class LogPanel

                          +--oaidtb.gui.customizedWeka.LogPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, weka.gui.Logger, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, weka.gui.TaskLogger
public class LogPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements weka.gui.Logger, weka.gui.TaskLogger

This panel allows log and status messages to be posted. Log messages appear in a scrollable text area, and status messages appear as one-line transient messages.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
Len Trigg (trigg@cs.waikato.ac.nz), Santiago David Villalba (sdvb@wanadoo.es)
See Also:
